headline: DOCTOR DOOM ISSUES ULTIMATUM
content: Victor Von Doom has broadcast a message to all global leaders demanding immediate surrender of sovereign borders. The Avengers have been summoned to the UN.

headline: Battle of New York: Encampment?
content: Stark Tower (now Avengers Tower) is being fortified. Reports confirm Thor and Captain Marvel have arrived on site. Is New York the first target?

headline: Wakanda Pledges Support
content: Shuri and the Dora Milaje have been spotted mobilizing Vibranium air-ships towards Europe. A global alliance against Doom is forming.

headline: Spider-Man: Missing in Action?
content: With the threat of Doomsday approaching, the friendly neighborhood Spider-Man has not been seen for weeks. Sources say he may be off-world with Doctor Strange.

headline: Fantastic Four Arrival Confirmed
content: Reed Richards and his team have reportedly made contact with S.H.I.E.L.D. Their knowledge of the Multiverse may be our only hope against Doom.

headline: Doombots Swarm Eastern Europe
content: Mechanical legions bearing the likeness of Doom have begun securing key infrastructure in Sokovia and neighboring regions.
